name: FBR1 FIREBURST
details:
Fuzz with mid-boostThick saturated fuzz with footswitchable mid-boost eq and pre/post gain circuit.
– true bypass signal path
– footswitchable between fuzz and mid-boosted distortion
– all discrete-component distortion and mid-boost circuit
– active Baxandall bass/treble tone control system
– battery or standard negative tip 9V DC adaptor operation
http://www.diamondpedals.com/products/fireburst/
